comments.author: fulner@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.1.16) Gecko/20110430 Iceape/2.0.11
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.1.16) Gecko/20110430 Iceape/2.0.11

If someone has sent a message to a large number of recipients there should be an option to add these contacts to a Mail List. 

I have a couple of emails I send out frequently and I never get around to adding them to a list, I end up keep doing a reply all, from a previous message and then editing everything, but it would be more appropriate if I could just use a mail list. 

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: fulner@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.1.16) Gecko/20110430 Iceape/2.0.11

If someone has sent a message to a large number of recipients there should be an option to add these contacts to a Mail List. 

I have a couple of emails I send out frequently and I never get around to adding them to a list, I end up keep doing a reply all, from a previous message and then editing everything, but it would be more appropriate if I could just use a mail list. 

Reproducible: Always
